title: AI for Good Challenge
tagline: Build for health, climate, and education
description: Transform lives with AI - join 2000+ innovators building solutions for humanity's biggest challenges.
longDescription:
üåü Join the most impactful AI hackathon of 2024! Over 48 hours, you'll collaborate with passionate developers, designers, and researchers to create AI solutions that tackle real-world problems. From revolutionizing healthcare access to combating climate change, your code can change the world.

üí° **Why Join?**
‚Ä¢ Work with industry mentors from Google, OpenAI, and Microsoft
‚Ä¢ Access to premium AI APIs and datasets
‚Ä¢ Win life-changing prizes including startup incubation
‚Ä¢ Build your portfolio with meaningful projects
‚Ä¢ Connect with a global community of changemakers

rules: Teams can have 2-5 members from any background or skill level
All AI models and code must be built during the hackathon hours
You can use any open-source frameworks, APIs, and pre-existing datasets
Projects must address at least one of the four impact tracks
Submissions require working demo, source code, and 2-minute pitch video
Solutions must be ethical and beneficial to society
All participants must follow our Code of Conduct for inclusive collaboration

eligibility.ipPolicy: Teams retain full ownership of their projects

faqs.question: Who can participate in AI for Good Challenge?
faqs.answer: Anyone passionate about using AI for social impact! Whether you're a student, professional, researcher, or complete beginner - all backgrounds and skill levels are welcome. We'll have workshops and mentors to help everyone contribute meaningfully.

faqs.question: Do I need prior AI/ML experience?
faqs.answer: Not at all! While AI knowledge helps, we value diverse perspectives. Many winning teams include designers, domain experts, and social scientists. We provide beginner-friendly workshops and APIs to get you started.

faqs.question: What's the judging criteria?
faqs.answer: Projects are evaluated on Social Impact (40%), Technical Innovation (30%), and Feasibility (30%). We prioritize solutions that can genuinely help people over pure technical complexity.

faqs.question: Is this fully online or in-person?
faqs.answer: It's hybrid! We have a beautiful venue in Chandigarh for local participants, plus full online participation for global teams. All workshops, mentoring, and judging happen both ways.

faqs.question: What resources and support do I get?
faqs.answer: Free access to premium AI APIs (OpenAI, Google Cloud AI, Azure), curated datasets, 24/7 mentor support, technical workshops, and a dedicated Discord community. Plus food and swag for in-person participants!

title: Maximally AI Shipathon
description: The ultimate 36-hour AI building marathon for creators who want to ship game-changing products.
longDescription:
üöÄ **The Fastest AI Building Event on the Planet!**

Join 1500+ builders, makers, and AI enthusiasts for the most intense 36-hour product sprint of your life. This isn't just another hackathon - it's a shipathon where your goal is to build, launch, and get real users for your AI-powered product.

‚ö° **What Makes This Special?**
‚Ä¢ Ship to real users during the event
‚Ä¢ Get live feedback and iterate instantly
‚Ä¢ Access to exclusive AI APIs and tools
‚Ä¢ Mentorship from unicorn startup founders
‚Ä¢ Prize for most user traction, not just demos
‚Ä¢ Global community of ambitious builders

criteria.name: User Traction
criteria.description: Real users, engagement, and product-market fit signals

criteria.name: Technical Excellence
criteria.description: Code quality, AI implementation, and scalability

criteria.name: Speed to Market
criteria.description: How quickly you shipped and iterated based on feedback

whyJoin: üéØ Ship real products with real users, not just demos
‚ö° Learn to build and iterate at lightning speed
ü§ñ Get early access to cutting-edge AI tools and APIs
üë• Connect with ambitious builders and potential co-founders
üí∞ Win based on actual user traction and growth metrics

gallery.caption: See the incredible products shipped in just 36 hours

prizes.title: Most User Traction
prizes.description: For the team with most real users and engagement

prizes.title: Technical Innovation
prizes.description: For outstanding AI implementation and code quality

prizes.title: Speed Demon
prizes.description: For fastest time from idea to shipped product

timeline.title: Shipathon Begins!
timeline.description: Start building - APIs unlocked, mentors ready

timeline.title: Ship Workshop
timeline.description: Learn rapid prototyping and launch strategies

timeline.title: First Ships Due
timeline.description: Demo your MVP to get early feedback

timeline.title: Iteration Sprint
timeline.description: Improve based on user feedback and data

timeline.title: Growth Hacking Session
timeline.description: Learn to get users and drive engagement

timeline.title: Final Ships
timeline.description: Submit your final product with user metrics

timeline.title: Demo & Awards
timeline.description: Present to judges and celebrate winners

rules: Teams of 1-4 builders focused on shipping real products
Must ship a working product accessible to real users during the event
You can use any AI APIs, frameworks, and existing tools/services
Projects must be started during the shipathon (no pre-built products)
Final submission must include live product link and user metrics
Judged primarily on real user traction and engagement metrics
Products must be family-friendly and comply with platform policies

faqs.question: What's the difference between this and a regular hackathon?
faqs.answer: This is a shipathon! Instead of just building demos, you'll ship real products that real users can access during the event. We judge based on actual user traction, not just technical demos.

faqs.question: Do I need to have users before the event starts?
faqs.answer: No! You'll build your product during the shipathon and get users during the event. We'll teach you growth strategies and provide resources to help you get your first users quickly.

faqs.question: What AI tools and APIs will be available?
faqs.answer: You'll get free access to OpenAI, Anthropic Claude, Vercel AI SDK, and other premium AI tools. Plus exclusive early access to new APIs from our sponsors.

faqs.question: How do you measure 'user traction'?
faqs.answer: We look at real users who sign up and actively use your product, engagement metrics, retention, and user feedback. Quality matters more than quantity - 10 engaged users beats 100 drive-by visitors.

title: Web3 Builder Fest
description: Create the next generation of decentralized applications and tools.
longDescription: A 72-hour marathon focused on building innovative Web3 solutions, DeFi protocols, and decentralized applications that will shape the future of the internet.

title: Climate Tech Sprint
description: Develop innovative solutions to combat climate change and promote sustainability.
longDescription: A weekend hackathon dedicated to building technology solutions that address environmental challenges and promote sustainable development.

title: Mobile Innovation Day
description: Create groundbreaking mobile apps that enhance user experiences.
longDescription: A fast-paced 24-hour mobile development challenge focused on creating innovative apps with exceptional user experiences.

title: HealthTech Breakthrough
description: Revolutionize healthcare with innovative technology solutions.
longDescription: A 48-hour hackathon focused on developing healthcare technology that improves patient outcomes and accessibility.

title: University Code Challenge
description: Students showcase their coding skills in this competitive challenge.
longDescription: An exclusive 36-hour coding competition for university students to demonstrate their programming abilities and innovative thinking.
